net.corda.contracts.asset

Class Commands.Settle<P>

  • net.corda.contracts.asset.Obligation.Commands.Settle<P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandData, FungibleAsset.Commands
    Enclosing interface:
    Obligation.Commands

    public static class Commands.Settle<P>
implements Obligation.Commands

    A command stating that the obligor is settling some or all of the amount owed by transferring a suitable state object to the beneficiary. If this reduces the balance to zero, the state object is destroyed.

    See Also:
    interface MoveCommand
